ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Surnames
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish I had spelled Quwi Changkane as Quai Changkane personally.  I did not know the proper spelling until I saw one of his Wanted posters on an old rerun
ygData.messageBody:
I wish I had spelled Quwi Changkane as "Quai
Changkane" personally. I did not know the proper
spelling until I saw one of his Wanted posters on an
old rerun of Kung Fu last year, doh.

I don't think a petition for a first name change would
work, so I've never tried. I grabbed that name
pre-Kunark and I'll bet most 4 letter names are gone
at this point.

Oh well... Quwi was a good shot at it phonetically :)

Quwi


--- Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@...> wrote:
>
> --- "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@...> wrote:
> > Level 20. Just type in /surname <and the one you
> > want> and if it's not taken
> > you'll get it.
>
> You can have the same last name as someone else. On
> my
> server, there are at least 25 toons with the last
> name
> of Lebowski, hehe. If for some reason the surname
> you
> pick is rejected, you can petition to get it, unless
> it is a phrase or some other violation of the naming
> policy. I had to petition to get 2 of my characters
> last names.
>
> =====
> ~~~~~~~~~
>
> And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You
> take over."
